title: Mindful Breath Timer Updates
description: Updates and news about the Mindful Breath Timer breathing exercise application

items.title: Enhanced Audio System Release
items.content_html: Major update with improved Tibetan bell sounds, multiple background noise types (white, pink, brown), and enhanced visual breathing guides.
items.content_text: Major update with improved Tibetan bell sounds, multiple background noise types (white, pink, brown), and enhanced visual breathing guides.
items.summary: Enhanced audio system with traditional frequencies and multiple noise types
